name: io.github.its-dart/dart-mcp-server
description: The official AI Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Dart, providing task and document management via prompts, resources, and tools.

prompts.name: Create task
prompts.description: Create a new task in Dart

prompts.name: Create doc
prompts.description: Create a new document in Dart

arguments.name: folder
arguments.description: Folder to place the document in

prompts.name: Summarize tasks
prompts.description: Get a summary of tasks with optional filtering

tools.name: get_config
tools.description: Get information about the user's space, including all of the possible values that can be provided to other endpoints. This includes available assignees, dartboards, folders, statuses, tags, priorities, and sizes.

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List tasks from Dart with optional filtering parameters. You can filter by assignee, status, dartboard, priority, due date, and more.

assignee.description: Filter by assignee name or email

due_at_before.description: Filter by due date before (ISO format)

due_at_after.description: Filter by due date after (ISO format)

start_at_before.description: Filter by start date before (ISO format)

start_at_after.description: Filter by start date after (ISO format)

tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task in Dart. You can specify title, description, status, priority, size, dates, dartboard, assignees, tags, and parent task.

description.description: A longer description of the task, which can include markdown formatting

status.description: The status from the list of available statuses

priority.description: The priority (Critical, High, Medium, or Low)

size.description: A number that represents the amount of work needed

startAt.description: The start date in ISO format (should be at 9:00am in user's timezone)

dueAt.description: The due date in ISO format (should be at 9:00am in user's timezone)

dartboard.description: The title of the dartboard (project or list of tasks)

assignees.description: Array of assignee names or emails (if workspace allows multiple assignees)

assignee.description: Single assignee name or email (if workspace doesn't allow multiple assignees)

tags.description: Array of tags to apply to the task

parentId.description: The ID of the parent task

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Retrieve an existing task by its ID. Returns the task's information including title, description, status, priority, dates, and more.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the task

tools.name: update_task
tools.description: Update an existing task. You can modify any of its properties including title, description, status, priority, dates, assignees, and more.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the task

description.description: A longer description of the task, which can include markdown formatting

status.description: The status from the list of available statuses

priority.description: The priority (Critical, High, Medium, or Low)

size.description: A number that represents the amount of work needed

startAt.description: The start date in ISO format (should be at 9:00am in user's timezone)

dueAt.description: The due date in ISO format (should be at 9:00am in user's timezone)

dartboard.description: The title of the dartboard (project or list of tasks)

assignees.description: Array of assignee names or emails (if workspace allows multiple assignees)

assignee.description: Single assignee name or email (if workspace doesn't allow multiple assignees)

tags.description: Array of tags to apply to the task

parentId.description: The ID of the parent task

tools.name: delete_task
tools.description: Move an existing task to the trash, where it can be recovered if needed. Nothing else about the task will be changed.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the task

tools.name: list_docs
tools.description: List docs from Dart with optional filtering parameters. You can filter by folder, title, text content, and more.

s.description: Search by title, text, or folder title

tools.name: create_doc
tools.description: Create a new doc in Dart. You can specify title, text content, and folder.

text.description: The text content of the doc, which can include markdown formatting

folder.description: The title of the folder to place the doc in

tools.name: get_doc
tools.description: Retrieve an existing doc by its ID. Returns the doc's information including title, text content, folder, and more.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the doc

tools.name: update_doc
tools.description: Update an existing doc. You can modify its title, text content, and folder.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the doc

text.description: The text content of the doc, which can include markdown formatting

folder.description: The title of the folder to place the doc in

tools.name: delete_doc
tools.description: Move an existing doc to the trash, where it can be recovered if needed. Nothing else about the doc will be changed.

id.description: The 12-character alphanumeric ID of the doc

resources.name: Dart config
resources.description: Information about the authenticated user associated with the API key, including their role, teams, and settings.

resources.name: Dart task
resources.description: A Dart task with its title, description, status, priority, dates, and more. Use this to fetch detailed information about a specific task.

resources.name: Dart doc
resources.description: A Dart doc with its title, text content, and folder. Use this to fetch detailed information about a specific doc.
